attributes.action: Ban businesses from turning away none customers wanting to use the toilet.
attributes.additional_details: People with hidden disabilities may also suffer from embarrassment and may not want to discuss their private health concerns.
attributes.background: The right for businesses to turn away members of the public for wanting to use the toilet should be banned in this country. Many members of the pubic suffer from hidden disabilities and also it is a human necessity to be able to use a toilet without preference if paying or not.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as this would be a decision for individual businesses. 

You could start a new petition asking the Government to fund a campaign to raise awareness of hidden disabilities, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
